item.description:
Good morning Packers,

Thank you to the huge crowd that turned up for the first win of the season and what a game, I would also like to thank Radeberger for hosting the party. Looking forward to our next game vs Carolina which will be on Sunday September 18 at 1.00pm, as some of you will remember from last year we show other sporting events, one of which will be on the morning of the 18th, “your” 2nd floor room will be in use until about 12.30pm at which point we will clean and set it up for you guys for 1.00pm, I am sorry for this inconvenience, it should not happen again for the rest of the season. As always any comments or suggestions are always welcome. GO PACK.

Best,

Ray Butler.

group.name: The Boston Green Bay Packers Meetup Group

item.name: Green Bay @ Carolina
